name: Space Man (2D Shooter)
description:
Space Man 2D Shooter

Modifications made from Original Creation are as follows

1) New song added to level 3 (Revelations).

2) New backgrounds added to each level.

3) New names for each level replacing generic names lvl 1, 2 and 3.

4) Boss AI added with increased HP, speed, and new look.

5) Level 2 (The Hive) created from the ground up to be a tough fly through shooter level with multiple enemies and a maze designed level.

6) Player look has been changed from generic look provided. 

7) Main Menu Text Item added to explain game controls

Credits:  

Made by, Conner Allen

Special Thanks to, DinV Studio for their 'Dynamic Space Background Lite, V1.1'

Crehera for their 'Pixel Art Spaceship Part 1, V1.0'

Eric Berzins for their 'Ultra Sci-Fi Game Audio Ambience Pack, V1.1'

and Orrin for their 'Spaceman, V1.0'
